GeneDef.label: construction incapable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have nomadic instincts that prevents them from creating structures.

GeneDef.label: construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: extreme construction instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively know how to build structures extremely fast compared to normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.
